name: Poke League
description:
The most original battle mode;
The most exciting real - time fighting system;
The most fun game of catching pet;

Go to adventure and capture more than 360 kinds of pets, evolute any pets you like to MG mode, be the greatest trainer, enjoy the fighting game.

Reproduce The Classic Game
Adventure story, world map, pet fighting mode, 100% reduction, more than 360 kinds of pets, 380 different pet skills, all decided by you!

Catch Pet
When you adventure in the story, you will meet different pet, fight against the pet, reduce its hp, then you can use the poke ball the catch it, be careful do not kill it, or you need to find another one to catch.

Pet Hunting Ground
Pet hunting ground is very interesting place, where you catch pet without SP. It costs tickets to join and you will meet one of pets, those pets are all rare pets
